title: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection
description: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection. I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed based on personal preference, which should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. All actions should be reachable from the editor. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not present in the context menu.
EB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' should be included in the context menu.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click to open the context menu.
4. Verify that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is included in the menu.
5. If the action is not present, switch to the Outline view and repeat the steps to verify if it appears in the context menu.
